description: A radio button. Selecting a radio button de-selects all its siblings (i.e. all radio buttons within the same parent).

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

checked.description: The checked state of the radio button.

text.description: The label text of the radio button.

tintColor.description: The color of the selectable area.

checkedTintColor.description: The color of the selectable area in checked state. Will fall back to `tintColor` if not set.

select.description: Fired when the radio button is selected or deselected by the user.
